abstract: Rudi Rubiandini, a former deputy energy minister, was detained for questioning following a raid at his home.
snippet: Rudi Rubiandini, a former deputy energy minister, was detained for questioning following a raid at his home.
lead_paragraph: JAKARTA, Indonesia — Indonesia’s anticorruption agency has arrested the head of the country’s oil and gas regulatory authority in connection with a bribery investigation, officials said Wednesday, in the latest setback for the country’s troubled energy sector.

headline.main: Oil Regulator in Indonesia Arrested in Bribery Investigation
headline.print_headline: Oil Regulator in Indonesia Arrested in Bribery Investigation
